casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Earl ASKEW 133P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 John R. Green, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. William Earl Askew, for Askew, William Earl.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of January 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

*593"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
